sentence: The endless debates over the invasion, air raids, speeches, etc., etc., are accompanied by countless exclamations such as “Eempossible!, Um Gottes Willen,* If they’re just getting started now, how long is it going to last!, It’s going splendidly, gut, great!” Optimists and pessimists—not to mention the realists—air their opinions with unflagging energy, and as with everything else, they’re all certain that they have a monopoly on the truth.
